entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High 13. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
